dmca.title: Serious Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Your Name [mailto:legal@desikama.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 12, 2007 7:18 AM
To: Copyright
Cc: Legal
Subject: Serious Copyright Violation

 Attn: Abuse Team @ theplanet.com
 
 Enclosed, please find the copyright violation notice against your 
 client debonairblog. Debonairblog had posted and is still 
 posting pictures and providing video links of our content for free to 
 users of their website. We urge you to take action against the 
 webmaster for posting copyrighted contents and providing video links 
 to copyrighted cotents which they do not own. 
 
 The number of copyright violations are huge and cannot be tolerated 
at any cost. If you have any questions, please call or email us. Our 
contact is provided on the notice.

 Yours sincerely,
 Aaron Tom
